body: What the guy below me said. Her situation is a bit like a person with a drinking problem. For a while you be ok and feel refreshed but after a while, you'll slowly get tempted by your past habits. MC might neglect her for a bit or she might find having sex with just one guy boring and as I said, she'll start missing getting fucked by random guys and would later result with NTR and/or cheating. What I said is based on hentai rules and of course a bit of reality.

I think I'll give me two cents given the controversy around this doujin. I would not rate this as wholesome. The thing about wholesome hentai is that fans want to use it to escape from the depressing reality we live in, so this doujin being "realistic" does not add wholsomeness value. The thing is, not many men are comfortable with committing to women having banged enough guys to fill an entire army battalion before. Just as there's nothing wrong with a woman racking up a bodycount, there's nothing wrong with a man disrespecting a woman because of it, because it comes down to a personal value judgement. Overall, too controversial too be classes as wholesome imo.
